name: Mia (TheBeardedOneNZ)
description:
Mia 

A Semi-Horror, 2D-Platformer which centers around a girl named Mia. After meeting a little ghost girl she joins her in hopes to find why shes in such a bizarre place. 

Art Style

The game is inspired by pixel art. The game consist of pixel tiles and in-game sprites including main character are pixel. 

Mechanics

  • Double jump 
  • Glow in the dark
  • Running simulator 
  • Narrative
